name: MyAccount Telekom
description: Cu noua aplicaie Telekom ai toate informaiile despre consum i serviciile tale ntr-un singur loc  cel mai bun instrument pentru monitorizarea costurilor i serviciilor Telekom.  Ai acces simplu i rapid la sumar profil ca s monitorizezi costurile tuturor serviciilor tale. De asemenea, noua aplicaie Telekom i ofer cea mai rapid i sigur metod pentru plat facturilor i rencrcarea numerelor prepaid cu un singur click folosind plata cu cardul. Gestioneaz serviciile tale i ale celor dragi oricnd i oriunde. O experien rapid, cursiv i robust reprezint nucleul noii aplicaii Telekom, ca s ai puterea de a gestiona toate serviciile tale. With the new Telekom app you have all your consumer and service information in one place - the best tool for monitoring Telekoms costs and services. You have simple and quick access to profile summary to monitor the costs of all your services. Also, the new Telekom app offers you the fastest and safest way to pay bills and recharge prepaid numbers with one click using card payment. Manage your services and your loved ones anytime, anywhere. A fast, cursory and robust experience is the core of Telekoms new application to have the power to manage all of your services.
